content: this little tree frog is not too complicated to crochet but it does have very tiny details and wire inside the legs which are a bit fiddly to make but if you have some patience and enjoy working on small details it s right up your alley size about 12 cm 4 3/4 long including legs body is about 6 cm 2 1/3 when crocheted with sport weight cotton and a 2 25 mm crochet hook us size 1/b copyright © 2013 tü spire all rights reserved please do not post this pattern to your website or blog instead post a link to https //kristitullus com/blogs/blog/news/free-pattern-tree-frog you may use this pattern as a teaching aid in any free class or e-course or as part of a free crochet pattern provided you credit me as the designer kristi tullus http //kristitullus com feel free to sell items made with this pattern
